title: I'm actually terrified of Nunu top if these changes go through
body:
Nunu top is absolutely oppressive in a 1v1. Worse than Panth or Teemo. Right now it isn't played much because AP Nunu has trash waveclear and is very ult reliant in team fights. He's also very gankable. But that doesn't change the fact that when you're alone with him in lane he dominates everyone. All he has to do is spam E then auto attack for his next free empowered E. You can't trade with him because he just consumes your damage away then presses E and walks away.

But now he's going to get a metric shit ton of extra AP for free making him even more oppressive. Please Riot we don't need ANOTHER champ like this top. We don't want another champ that is brutally oppressive where the only counterplay is "wait for a 2v1". "Just survive while you get absolutely shit on with no counterplay" is a fucking awful design.

40% is too much for the early game even if it's capped. Nunu coming back to lane with a NLR in addition to his dorans ring will give him over 100 AP with just rank 1 W. Please consider drastically lowering the W cap at earlier ranks so he can't just max E while still getting tons of bonus AP

replies.body: Keep in mind that very soon his E will draw minion aggro, which will make his trades a bit less one-sided.
No it won't. Nunu just Es you from his creeps and will take absolutely no minion damage. Case in point: {{champion:41}}
I played Riven against him, maxed E, and had an easy lane. Just sustain or block his damage and waste his mana.

I watched Boxbox, Exil, and other high elo Riven players and the general point is that you don't just max Q mindlessly every game. You max what helps you win the lane phase because getting fed is good.

We need more of this. I hate when people always max the same way or always just build the same 3 items? Like when someone rushes {{item:3065}} {{item:3111}}  vs an all AD team and loses lane super hard... lol

The guy that responded to me does nothing but disagrees with me no matter what I say. Also yeah, people don't grasp maxing different spells. They literally always max the same thing no matter what, and on some champs that works and others it does not.

Riven can max Q or E, W isn't good enough but E is a very solid and sometimes better max than Q.
It's not "for free". He has to build AP to get any sort of benefit out of it.

Lol even the most underpowered champion in the game draws "NERF  HIM, HIS BUFF WILL MAKE HIM TOO STRONG" complaints.  jesus christ i lose more respect for this player base every single day. you always cry and moan about the smallest possible things, whether it be skins, splash arts, or buffs to the weakest champion that HAVEN'T EVEN FUCKING HAPPENED YET.

That why his solo lane is bad for seasons now because riot gut the Q and W and his base HP and Regen

At least the point-and click changes to minion aggro would mitigate this a bit if they go through. He won't be able to just poke you for free in the early game anymore because minions hurt, and his lack of significant waveclear will make it so that it should be easy to build up a minion wave to protect you and then crash it into his tower to cost him CS and give you time to recall and get an item lead on him.

I'm not saying that nunu isn't BS. He is. I fucking hate that champion, but I'm glad that Riot is looking at making changes to the game that could make it safer and more fair for people to play against him and others like him such as pantheon or teemo.
Most people aren't aware of the horror of solo lane Nunu. Once tanks leave top lane, utility AP's will make a return.
